name: CLVisit
desc: Information about the user's location during a specific period of time.

items.name: var horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The horizontal accuracy (in meters) of the specified coordinate.

items.name: var arrivalDate: Date
items.desc: The approximate time at which the user arrived at the specified location.

items.name: var departureDate: Date
items.desc: The approximate time at which the user left the specified location.
